text: Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm is a 1932 American children's drama movie directed by Alfred Santell and is the second adaption of the 1903 novel and 1910 play of the same name. It stars Marian Nixon, Ralph Bellamy, Mae Marsh, Louise Closser Hale, Sarah Padden, Alphonse Ethier and distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1932 drama movies Category:1930s family movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set on farms Category:Movies based on plays Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Alfred Santell
title: Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm (1932 movie)
